mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pet (pet_name, pet_age, pet_gender , mem_id) VALUES (#{petName},#{petAge},#{petgender},#{memId})
mapper.select: select p.pet_name, p.pet_age, p.pet_gender, p.mem_id, p.pet_seq, f.fno, f.filename, f.fileOriname, f.fileurl from tb_pet p , files f where p.mem_id = f.memId and p.mem_id = #{memId}
